name: Moujuutsukai to Oujisama Portable
overview: Tiana wants to be a great animal tamer like her mother, and on the day that she arrives to her new home in Cattelya, she comes across four animals that she buys along with a strange brooch. But soon the animals start talking to her, telling her that they are actually four princes who were struck with a curse, and they need her help...
